items.title: Domestic formulations biz expected to grow 9-10% over next decade: Glenmark
items.description: The domestic formulations market is estimated to be at Rs 2 lakh crore, with a growth rate of 11 percent over the past two decades

items.title: Bank of America allegedly shared non-public information with investors in India: WSJ Reports
items.description: The report further stated that Bank of America has opened an internal investigation after a whistleblower complaint was made in June

items.title: Adani Group floats China subsidiary for providing project management services
items.description: Adani Enterprises, the group's flagship firm, in the filing said a Singapore-based step-down subsidiary incorporated a wholly-owned subsidiary, Adani Energy Resources (Shanghai) Co. (AERCL), domiciled in Shanghai, China on September 2, 2024

items.title: Tech disruptions, increase in AI usage major cause of worry among young professionals: Report
items.description: The biggest impact of this disruption is likely to be felt by younger professionals as around 83 percent of the entry-level respondents of the survey feel their jobs could be the first casualty, as per the report.
